availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Barnett S. Franks (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia Sleet Franks in Boone County, Kentucky, on November 1, 1859. Father of Nancy E. Franks, Mary E. Franks, and Francis M. Franks. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 96.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 3.
